name: Minima15: Trajectory
description:
Summary:

Crash into the bright white targets to extend your life.

Avoid the dark black voids which bring instant death.

Last as long as you can for maximum points.

Use left/right arrow keys to control yourself.


Minima?

Minima is my series of games that focus on a single game mechanic. Due to time constraints the presentation of these games is fairly ... minimal.

This is my 15th Minima game ("bitesize nuggets of gaming fun!") and my January entry for #1GAM.

If you enjoyed this then why not go to my website for more gaming snacks made for my own amusement. Thanks.
